name: The Elysian Games
description:
Every year, on the summer solstice, a tournament was hosted in Ancient Greece. The rules? Last man standing wins. The prize? The right to enter Elysium, the eternal paradise, as a hero… Holding high the banner of one of the great gods. Which god will you champion? How will you fight? And, most importantly, how will you win?

Do you like Battle Royales but want quicker matches and prefer close-range combat over being sniped from across the map? Do you like MOBA-style combat with quick deathmatches but want a free-for-all experience or a larger environment? This game fills a unique niche amidst these two genres!

This game appeals to the competitive. Our design is centered around the ability to dominate other players with the skillful use of the environment, items, and abilities that you have at your disposal. Players who love that feeling are going to love this game.
